events.title: Marie Antoinette gives birth to a baby girl, Marie Thérèse Charlotte

movie.title: Marie Antoinette
movie.plot: The retelling of France's iconic but ill-fated queen, Marie Antoinette. From her betrothal and marriage to Louis XVI at 15 to her reign as queen at 19 and ultimately the fall of Versailles.

movie.title: Mr. Turner
movie.plot: Eccentric British painter J.M.W. Turner  lives his last 25 years with gusto and secretly becomes involved with a seaside landlady, while his faithful housekeeper bears an unrequited love for him.
movie.awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 19 wins & 64 nominations.

events.title: Cole Porter and Linda Thomas meet

movie.title: De-Lovely
movie.plot: From Paris to Venice to Broadway to Hollywood, the lives of Cole Porter and his wife, Linda were never less than glamorous and wildly unconventional. And though Cole's thirst for life strained their marriage, Linda never stopped being his muse, inspiring some of the greatest sons of the twentieth century.
movie.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 2 wins & 11 nominations.

events.title: Elvis Presley leaves Memphis for Los Angeles

movie.title: Elvis & Nixon
movie.plot: In 1970, a few days before Christmas, Elvis Presley showed up on the White House lawn seeking to be deputized into the Bureau of Narcotics and Dangerous Drugs by the President himself.

events.title: Jay Moriarty wipes out at Mavericks, and a picture of his wipeout appears on the cover of Surfer magazine

movie.title: Chasing Mavericks
movie.plot: Surfer Jay Moriarity sets out to ride the Northern California break known as Mavericks.

movie.title: The Day Britain Stopped
movie.plot: One day in the near future, a rail strike, traffic congestion and a mid-air plane collision bring the UK's transport system to a halt.

events.title: Daniel fights in a karate tournament

movie.title: The Karate Kid
movie.plot: Hassled by the school bullies, Daniel LaRusso has his share of adolescent woes. Luckily, his apartment building houses a resident martial arts master: Kesuke Miyagi, who agrees to train Daniel ... and ends up teaching him much more than self-defense. Armed with newfound confidence, skill and wisdom, Daniel ultimately faces off against his tormentors in this hugely popular classic underdog tale.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.
